docs.text: NAME aeb - Andrew E. Bruno SYNOPSIS software engineer, system administrator, bioinformatician DESCRIPTION Andrew enjoys spending his time tinkering with code, administering high performance GNU/Linux systems, hacking genomic sequences, and baking tasty creations with his natural leavening agent named fermy. He currently works at the University at Buffalo, Center for Computational Research ( CCR ). OPTIONS -a, --about Display version information -k, --public-key PGP Public Key -c, --code Free software -v, --verbose Curriculum Vitae SEE ALSO https://buffalo.edu/~aebruno2 COPYRIGHT This work is licensed under the CC BY-ND 4.0 license.
docs.title: Andrew E. Bruno
